message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product worth $8000 at a competitive rate. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you would like to discuss further details.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the discount, but I'm looking to get a better price. I'm willing to pay $7000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $7200 for the product. This price still reflects the value of the product while considering your budget constraints. I hope this aligns more closely with your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
